name: Stickman Five Night Survival 2
description:
Can you survive another five nights in the stickman madhouse?

Keep an eye on your security cameras.
Use your trackers to pinpoint the whereabouts of the madhouse inmates.
Use the new stun button to electrocute the stickmen and stop them from moving (for a short time).
Close the doors to stop the inmates attacking you!

Welcome to the 2nd most scary stickman game ever created - this time in colour!
Can you survive five night shifts and reach the end of the week!
